Public MustInherit Class ManagementQuery Implements ICloneable

summary.span: 提供抽象基底類別 (Base Class) 給所有管理查詢物件。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for all management query objects.

remarks.format: 這個類別是抽象的;在 API 中，實際上會使用它的衍生物件。This class is abstract; only derivatives of it are actually used in the API.

span.span: Returns a copy of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

span.span: The query string to be parsed.

summary.span: 剖析查詢字串，並相應的設定屬性值。

span.span: Parses the query string and sets the property values accordingly.

summary.span: 如果查詢有效，便會剖析查詢的類別名稱屬性及 Condition 屬性。

span.span: If the query is valid, the class name property and condition property of the query will be parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將查詢剖析為類別名稱] 和 [條件屬性。The following example parses a query into class name and condition properties. summary.span: 取得或設定使用於查詢字串中的查詢語言，定義查詢字串的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the query language used in the query string, defining the format of the query string.

value.span: 傳回 值，包含查詢字串的格式。

span.span: Returns a value containing the format of the query string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 可以設定為任何支援的查詢語言。Can be set to any supported query language. < WQL > 是 WMI 本質上支援的唯一值。"WQL" is the only value supported intrinsically by WMI. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string QueryString { get; set; }
.property instance string QueryString
Public Overridable Property QueryString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ QueryString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QueryString : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定文字格式的查詢。

span.span: Gets or sets the query in text format.

value.span: 傳回包含查詢的 值。

span.span: Returns a value containing the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 如果查詢物件建構不含任何參數，屬性為 null，直到特別設定。If the query object is constructed with no parameters, the property is null until specifically set. 如果物件以指定的查詢建構，這個屬性會傳回指定的查詢字串。If the object was constructed with a specified query, the property returns the specified query string. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
